content: limited quantities from this pattern - if you do please credit handmade by ani anika kam as the designer 3 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau head and body 8 ply cotton in green the head and body is one piece starting from the top of the dino r1 6 double_crochet in magic_ring 6 sts r2 increase x 6 12 sts r3 double_crochet 1 increase x 6 18 sts r4 double_crochet 1 increase double_crochet 1 x 6 24 sts r5 double_crochet 3 increase x 6 30 sts eye mouth and cheek placement r6 double_crochet in each st 30 sts r7 double_crochet 7 increase double_crochet 7 x 2 32 sts r8 double_crochet 15 increase x 2 34 sts r9 double_crochet 8 increase double_crochet 8 x 2 36 sts r10 double_crochet in each st 36 sts r11 double_crochet 5 increase x 6 42 sts r12 - r15 double_crochet in each st i e 4 rounds 42 sts place safety eyes between rounds 9 and 10 st 12 and st 18 this placing is important as we will be crocheting the tail to the body completed r16 and first st of r17 embroider a mouth between the eyes and some cheeks next to the eyes r16 double_crochet 34 chain 8 skip 8 sts 42 sts we will be crocheting the tail using this chain and the skipped 8 stitches later on r17 - r18 double_crochet in each st i e 2 rounds 42 sts r19 double_crochet 5 decrease x 6 36 sts continued on next page crochet along chain in r17 disclaimer please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern - if you do please credit handmade by ani anika kam as the designer 4 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau head and body continued r20 double_crochet 2 decrease double_crochet 2 x 6 30 sts r21 double_crochet 3 decrease x 6 24 sts r22 double_crochet 1 decrease double_crochet 1 x 6 18 sts begin stuffing r23 decrease x 9 9 sts finish stuffing finished head and body fasten_off and leave a long thread thread the yarn through the front loops of the 9 sts and pull to close weave in the end tail 8 ply cotton in green re-join yarn to first skipped stitch of r16 using a standing double_crochet or your preferred method the standing double_crochet will count as the first st of the round note refer to video links on page 3 which show how re-join yarn to first skipped st of r16 to re-join yarn using a standing double_crochet as well as how to crochet the tail into the skipped stitches and chain from r16 of the body r1 double_crochet in each st 16 sts r2 double_crochet 3 decrease double_crochet 3 x 2 14 sts r3 double_crochet 5 decrease x 2 12 sts r4 double_crochet 2 decrease double_crochet 2 x 2 10
